body.headline: HOW DOES THE APP WORK?

content.text: As long as you have the app installed, you will receive 50 photo prints from us every month - just like that. Go ahead and select the matching pictures and also order one of our stylish picture boxes!
50 FOTOABZÜGE FOR FREE

Get your photo books easily compiled by us using the Magic Books Feature in the MYPOSTER app. The app recognizes holidays, trips, and more based on location data from your images and automatically creates a suitable photo book for you. Of course, you can also manually adjust the design and timeframe. Then simply tap on 'Order'!
GENERATE PHOTO BOOKS AUTOMATICALLY WITH OUR APP - USING MAGIC BOOKS

With our Augmented Reality feature, you can preview your pictures on the wall before ordering them - just using your smartphone. This way, you get an instant sense of the look and know which size fits best.
PROJECT IMAGES ON THE WALL - WITH AR PREVIEW IN THE APP

With our configurator, you can customize your photo product 100% individually - photos, backgrounds, materials, image elements. Simply choose appropriate images and a design template, and let your creativity roam free. Everything works super intuitively in our app.
EASY GESTALTEN IN UNSEREM KONFIGURATOR

Have you experienced something nice together? Then create a scrapbook for your friends in the MYPOSTER app! This way, you can upload all your pictures in the best quality via a link or QR code - and you can create the perfect photo product in just a few minutes on your smartphone!
COLLECTING STICKERS WITH FRIENDS

Why only order one picture when you can design the whole wall in our app? Order multi-part photo walls from us that fit perfectly together. In the app, you can try out different variants, preview them in 3D, and order the result as prints on your favorite material. Of course, you will also receive assembly instructions!
SIMPLE DESIGN FOR PHOTO WALLS
No matter how big or small you want to print your pictures – in our app, you get them customized, and you can also unleash your creativity with templates, filters, and editing tools!
MAKE IT SUITABLE IN THE APP

When paying with us in the app, you have all options available - whether it's Apple Pay, Google Pay, Paypal, card, instant bank transfer, invoice, or direct debit. This way, you always remain maximally flexible!
PAY WITH GOOGLE AND APPLE PAY

content.text: Ein Bild sagt mehr als 1.000 Worte - aber eine
Fotocollage
? Die erzählt ganze Geschichten! Mit MYPOSTER kannst Du jetzt ganz einfach Deine

bietet für jeden Geschmack und Anlass das Richtige - ob romantisch verspielt, modern und minimalistisch oder klassisch elegant. Du wählst einfach deine Lieblingsvorlage aus und fügst Deine persönlichen Bilder hinzu - völlig unkompliziert und ohne jegliche Vorkenntnisse oder technische Finessen. Und mit unserer Auswahl an hochwertigen Materialien findest Du garantiert die perfekte Kombination, um Deine Bilder bestmöglich zur Geltung zu bringen. Bringe Deine Fotos zum Sprechen und verleihe jedem Raum Deine ganz persönliche Note - mit einer
Foto Collage von MYPOSTER
Create your personalized photo collage
Werde kreativ und gestalte eine
Fotocollage für jeden Anlass
: Bringe das Geburtstagskind zum Strahlen mit einer
Fotocollage zum Geburtstag

voller Erinnerungen aus vergangenen Jahren, perfekt für das Wohnzimmer oder Kinderzimmer, um die besonderen Momente im Leben gebührend zu feiern. Halte die magischen Momente Deines großen Tages mit einer
Fotocollage zur Hochzeit
für die Ewigkeit fest und schmücke damit dein Schlafzimmer oder Wohnzimmer. Unsere
Collage Liebe

zeigt Deinen Liebsten, wie viel sie Dir bedeuten - nicht nur am Valentinstag. Diese liebevoll gestaltete Collage bringt Romantik in Deine vier Wände und lässt Herzen höherschlagen. Verbreite Festtagsstimmung mit einer ganz persönlich gestalteten
Fotocollage Weihnachten
und verschenke Erinnerungen. Überrasche Oma und Opa mit einer Collage der schönsten Fotos ihrer Enkel. Entdecke viele
weitere Collage-Ideen

und füge Deine Bilder online zu einem Meisterwerk zusammen: feiere Baby's 1. Jahr, die Highlights deiner letzten Reise, unvergessliche Erinnerungen mit deinen Freunden oder gestalte einen kreativen Jahresrückblick mit einer einzigartigen Fotocollage.
The perfect photo collage template for any occasion
The selection of the right material is crucial to create the desired ambiance and showcase your collage to its best advantage.
Canvas prints
are particularly suitable for landscape shots, abstract artworks, and artistic photographs. These motifs gain an additional dimension due to the natural texture of the canvas.
Acrylic glass prints

are ideal for motifs that require a clear and brilliant display. Colors are rendered particularly vividly due to the smooth surface of the acrylic glass, making them perfect for high-quality photographs, portraits, and modern artworks. Acrylic glass prints work especially well in well-lit spaces like living rooms or offices. Collages of landscape shots or architectural photographs stand out particularly well on
Alu-Dibond

, as the material offers a matte surface and high color fidelity. Alu-Dibond is also suitable for use in damp areas such as bathrooms and kitchens due to its robust nature, being waterproof and wipeable.
Poster prints
are versatile and are chosen for decorating living rooms, bedrooms, children's and teenagers' rooms due to their lightness and affordability.
Find the perfect combination of design and material for your photo collage
Are you looking for a
photo collage 10x15
or perhaps a
photo collage in XXL size
? At MYPOSTER, you are not only flexible in terms of collage design. Whether you are looking for a long collage or a portrait-oriented collage - with us, you can create the perfect
collage in your desired format
for any wall and any space.
Our formats are simply smart - Fotocollage XXL or Fotocollage Din A4

image optimization tools

to make the most out of your images.
Creating a photo collage - super easy, super personalized
Wähle eine unserer zahlreichen Collage Vorlagen oder beginne mit einem leeren Entwurf bzw. Blanco Design, um ihn zu personalisieren
Wähle das richtige Format und das Material, auf dem Du Deine Collage drucken möchtest (Poster, Leinwand, gerahmtes Foto, Acryl, Glas, Aluminium-Dibond, Gallery Bond, Werbeleinwand...)

Individualisiere Deine Collage mit unserem Collage Maker: kombiniere Bilder nach Wunsch, füge neue Textfelder hinzu oder nutze unsere vielen Gestaltungselemente

How can I create a collage?
Du möchtest eine
Fotocollage erstellen
und Deinem Meisterwerk gleich den richtigen Rahmen geben? Bei MYPOSTER findest Du die richtige
Bilderrahmen Collage

Rahmen aus Holz, Aluminium oder Kunststoff
in verschiedenen Ausführungen hinzu und Du erhältst eine
professionell und staubfrei gerahmte Fotocollage

. Egal, ob Du einen klassischen Holzrahmen für einen nostalgischen Look bevorzugst, einen eleganten Aluminiumrahmen für einen modernen Touch wünscht oder einen robusten Kunststoffrahmen für eine praktische Lösung benötigst - wir haben die passende Rahmenoption für Deine Fotocollage. Unsere hochwertigen Rahmen sorgen nicht nur für einen stilvollen Abschluss Deiner Collage, sondern schützen Deine Bilder auch vor Staub und anderen Umwelteinflüssen, damit deine Erinnerungen lange Zeit strahlen können.
Photo collage in frame

body.headline: HOW TO CREATE THE PERFECT PHOTO COLLAGE

content.text: Printed photo collages are excellent for
decorating
your home, as meaningful
gifts
for your loved ones, or for hanging up on special
occasions
. Collages can tell stories by combining different moments or
events in a composition

, which can be more challenging to achieve with individual photo prints. They group images with a common theme in a clear and space-saving way. You can arrange the images in the collage to harmonize for presentation and visual impact, without being bound by fixed frames or sizes of individual photos. With the right tricks, you can create a
photo collage
that not only captures glances but also touches hearts. It grabs attention and
tells a story
or presents your best moments in an impressive manner.
Collagen sind darum eine beliebte Wahl
You can arrange photo collages in different ways:
Stylistic Collage

: Design your photo collage according to a specific style or aesthetic, such as Vintage or Boho. Use filters or special layouts to achieve the desired style and create a cohesive atmosphere. For example, you can create a vintage collage with old family photos, faded colors, and nostalgic elements to evoke a sentimental mood.
Chronological Collage
: Choose photos from different moments of your life and arrange them in chronological order. This way, you can relive your memories in their temporal sequence and see how they have evolved over time.
Thematic Collage
: Create a collage with photos on a specific theme, such as vacation, wedding, birthday, or travel. Arrange the photos artistically to tell a visual story.
How to merge pictures online
Bildauswahl
: Verwende nicht zu viele Bilder, um die Collage nicht überladen wirken zu lassen. In der Regel funktionieren Collagen am besten mit 5-10 Bildern.
Layout und Format
: Experimentiere mit verschiedenen Formaten, wie quadratisch, rechteckig oder sogar kreisförmig, um den gewünschten visuellen Effekt zu erzielen.
Farbliche Gestaltung

: Achte auf die Farbwahl Deiner Bilder, um eine harmonische Collage zu erstellen. Bilder mit ähnlichen Farbpaletten können gut zusammenpassen und ein zusammenhängendes Erscheinungsbild erzeugen. Du kannst auch Farbfilter verwenden, um den Bildern einen einheitlichen Stil zu verleihen.
Texte

: Du kannst eine Collage bereichern, indem Du zusätzliche Informationen, Zitate oder eine persönliche Botschaft hinzufügst. Verwende Text sparsam und platziere ihn strategisch. Wähle gut lesbare Schriftarten und passende Textfarben.
Proportionen beachten

: Achte darauf, dass die Proportionen der Bilder in Deiner Collage zueinander passen. Vermeide es, Bilder zu stark zu vergrößern oder zu verkleinern, da dies das Gesamtbild stören kann. Bei unterschiedlichen Bildgrößen platziere größere Bilder im Hintergrund und kleinere im Vordergrund.
Creating the perfect photo collage - 5 tips

body.headline: Photo Collage - Popular questions

content.text: A collage is an artistic technique where different images, materials, or objects are arranged and glued or attached to create a new artwork on a surface. Collages can consist of photos, newspaper clippings, texts, colors, or other elements. A photo collage is a special type of collage where only photographs are used and creatively assembled. This allows memories and events to be captured in a single image and tell whole stories.
What is a collage

No matter if you want to create a photo collage with 3 pictures, 12 pictures, or a photo collage with 100 pictures, at MYPOSTER you are maximally flexible and thanks to our matching templates, all options are open to you.
Can I create a photo collage with many pictures?
Wähle eine unserer Vorlagen oder ein Blanko Design
Lade Deine Bilder hoch
Wähle Format und Material
Fotocollage prüfen…fertig
How can I create a photo collage?
For a very good result and high-quality print, we recommend a minimum of 150 dpi (dots per inch) or in other words, 60 pixels per square centimeter.
What resolution should images have for a photo collage?
We process the following pixel-based file formats: JPG, TIFF, PNG, and PDF up to a size of 100 MB.
What file formats can I upload?

Many of our collage templates already include text elements. If you want to add more text boxes, simply click on the button with the large +T on the bottom right of our Collage Maker, next to your photo collage.
How do I create a collage with text?
Arrange your images in our collage maker either manually or choose 'auto-fill'. Our configurator will then automatically create a photo collage with your photos.
How can I arrange images in a collage?

Download our app, scroll to the Photo Collages section, and select your desired format. Then simply add your favorite photos from your phone and let our Collage Designer do the rest. If you don't want to make any further changes to the images, just choose the appropriate material and place the product in your cart. By clicking 'Order', your photo collage will then be on its way to you in the quickest time possible.
How do you make a collage on your phone?
Simply choose one of our many themed templates. With a click, you will enter our configurator where you only need to upload your own images.
How can I set a template?

In unserem Collage Maker kannst Du rechts unter dem Button "Größe" das Format deiner Fotocollage einstellen. Wir empfehlen immer zuerst das gewünschte Format, in Deinem bevorzugten Seitenverhältnis anzulegen, bevor Du die Gestaltung der Collage mit Layout und Bildern beginnst.
How do I choose the format for my collage?
After clicking on "Create Collage", choose the desired size in the Collage Maker under "Size" on the right side. For a portrait orientation, we recommend layouts such as 3:4, 2:3, or 1:2.
How can I create a portrait-oriented collage?

Yes, you can save your collage at any time by using the "save in customer account" feature to store it temporarily and continue working on it later. Simply create a customer account for this purpose. You will then find the collage in your customer account under "My Collages".
Can I save my collage and continue editing it later?

It depends on the materials used to create picture collages. If they are made from high-quality and durable materials such as canvas, acrylic glass, or aluminium composite panel, they can last for many years.
How long-lasting are photo collages?
When choosing materials, you are extremely flexible. You can create collages not only on a classic canvas or poster, but also on acrylic glass, aluminum dibond, or gallery bond.
What materials can I use for a collage?
The delivery times from handover to our shipping partners are usually 1 to 3 business days.
What are the delivery times of an online created photo collage?
Here in our
help section

you will find many answers to the most common questions. Need more detailed information? Then our customer service is available Monday to Friday 8:00 - 17:00 at 08131 380 3008, or you can email us at service@myposter.de.

Choose your layout.

You can go for a classic look with black or white, or you can experiment with different colors. It often looks good to use a color tone from your photos in the background or choose a contrasting color to make your pictures stand out even more. You can also add text in various fonts, and then you can download your finished collage for free. If you are happy with the result, we can print it for you on posters, canvas, acrylic glass, and more!

body.headline: Design a baby collage: Your sweetest memories

content.text: Creating your own baby photo collages is truly as easy as pie! Firstly, because you probably take many photos of your baby, giving you a wide selection of cute pictures to choose from. And secondly, because there are so many fantastic design templates, high-quality paper options, and countless customization possibilities that allow for creative and enchanting baby collages of your little sunshine to come to life.

body.headline: Collage: "My 1st year" and more

content.text: You will be amazed when you see our lovingly designed templates! Charming designs, delicate colors, and cute cliparts beautifully showcase the photos of your little sunshine. Add your baby's name and personalized texts in the shape and color of your choice. Create your baby collage for yourself, as decoration for the nursery, or as the perfect gift from the grandchild to the grandparents.
So many beautiful baby collage templates!

Design your collage image completely by yourself and also match the material to your photos. Would you like your baby collage on a real canvas? As a premium poster or rather as an exquisite Hahnemühle poster, as an acrylic glass picture or on aluminum dibond? Simply on the raw material or with a stylish frame? Even the material of the frame and the color can be customized to your liking. A mat would be nice? That's possible too! Explore now the many options in the collage configurator so you can soon hang your perfect baby collage in your favorite spot.
Your baby photo collage on the material of your choice

Das erste Lächeln, der erste Brei, die ersten Krabbel- und Stehversuche – Dein Baby entwickelt sich so schnell! Umso wichtiger ist es, jeden wichtigen Augenblick im Leben Deines kleinen Schatzes fotografisch festzuhalten. Du kannst natürlich einfach drauflos knipsen, aber mit ein paar kleinen Tricks erschaffst Du mega schöne und professionell wirkende Babyaufnahmen. Lese deshalb jetzt unseren Artikel „Babyfotografie: Ausdrucksstarke Bilder gestalten“ im MYPOSTER Online-Magazin! Brauche ich Requisiten? Welches Licht ist am besten? Welche Kamera-Einstellungen eignen sich? Diese und weitere Fragen werden Dir beantwortet, und Du findest weitere Tipps rund um Gestaltungs- und Deko-Ideen mit Deinen Babyfotos.
How to take really good photos for your baby collage

After choosing any number of photos, the material, and matching design templates, a gift is created that will make the recipient happy for a long time. Last Minute Tip: If you have ever forgotten a birthday, use our express shipping for birthday collages - order by 11am, receive it the next day.

body.headline: Unique: Your "Birthday" Photo Collage

content.text: What could be more personalized than a self-made photo collage for a birthday gift? If you really want to make someone happy, browse through your photos taken together with the recipient. After giving the gift, reminisce about the many shared moments, bask in wonderful memories together, and the best part is: the birthday person will now think of you daily when their gaze falls upon your birthday collage.

Photo Collages for Friends
and
Birthday Banners
to get more ideas!

body.headline: Photo Collage for the wedding

content.text: A great day filled with wonderful memories and even more amazing photos. These can all be included in your personally-designed wedding collage. The glowing bride and groom, the happy wedding party, and the lively celebration: all these beautiful moments belong on your wedding collage. You can use our numerous templates, which you can personalize to your heart's content. By the way, a photo collage is also a perfect gift idea for the couple, created from the most beautiful moments of their shared time together.
Now create your very own personalized wedding collage!

body.headline: Say yes to the "Wedding" collage

content.text: Make sure to think about the style of your pictures and which motifs should definitely be included before the wedding. You can quickly find your perfect wedding collage template based on this. In addition, you can design your
Save the Date cards

in this style. A photo collage also makes a great gift for the bridal couple, capturing all the beautiful moments. Similarly, a collage can be given as a guest gift, showcasing the funniest photos of the guests with the bride and groom. Another lovely idea for decoration using photos is a
wedding banner
that you can also create in our collage designer. The many creative options at MYPOSTER will assist you with the preparation and aftermath of your wedding. Start designing your wedding collage now!
Think about your wedding collage before the celebration

When it comes to our design templates, you'll become a yes man! Easily choose the template for your 'Wedding' collage that you like the most. You can then customize it in the configurator to suit your preferences - all from your smartphone, computer, or tablet. Simply replace our sample images with your own, add as many photos as you like, change the background, insert cute clip arts and personal texts. Lastly, select the format, your desired material, and optionally add a frame and a mat - just the way you like it. Of course, your most precious moments can also be printed at MYPOSTER as
wedding photos
. Our customers also love a
wedding photo book
, which offers a wide selection of countless templates. Ready to create your own wedding collage with your photos now!

body.headline: Create a photo collage with lots of pictures

content.text: Caution: Our collages have real addictive potential! Whether it's 50, 100, or 500 pictures - create a photo collage with many images effortlessly. Add as many photos as you like, and also customize backgrounds, text fields, and many decorative details. Bring all your beautiful memories together and design your collage with many small photos as a poster, canvas, on acrylic glass, and other materials!
An unforgettable holiday, a mega party, or simply shared experiences: There are so many occasions to take photos, and quickly you have hundreds of pictures together. That's why you should use our
numerous pre-made photo collage templates
. You can create
XXL collages
with 50, 60, 70, or even 80 photos. Moreover, you can add as many photos as you like, so your photo collage can quickly feature well over 100 images.
Your photos, your collage - Many pictures in one XXL collage
Du willst es noch individueller? Unsere Vorlagen sind nur der Anfang! Wenn Du Deine Favoriten gefunden hast, könntest Du die Vorlage im Konfigurator ergänzen, komplett anpassen und
beliebig viele Fotos hinzufügen
- am Rechner, Smartphone oder auf dem Tablet. Du kannst den Hintergrund ändern, Format & Material anpassen, Texte schreiben, lustige Cliparts platzieren und mehr! Probiere
verschiedenen Ideen

einfach aus, bevor Du Dich festlegst. Alle Deine Entwürfe speicherst Du mit einem Klick in Deinem Kundenkonto, so dass Du sie danach miteinander vergleichen kannst. Am Ende musst Du Dich nur noch für die schönste Collage und das
passende Material
entscheiden. Mach’s passend und bestelle jetzt Deine Collage mit vielen Bildern - ohne oder gleich mit passendem Rahmen!
You can customize your photo collage with many images in the configurator.

If all your most beautiful pictures are on your smartphone, the MYPOSTER App can help you easily create photo collages with many images. Here you can let your creativity run wild and take your photo collage to a new level with various enhancements, clip arts, and fonts. Simply upload your photos from your smartphone, Instagram, or Facebook account, choose the appropriate format, edit your image until you are satisfied, and place your order without having to create an account. The MYPOSTER Android App is even recognized as the best photo printing app by Androidmag.
Start designing now! You will receive your photo collage with many images through the app in just a few days!
Your collage can also be created with many pictures in the app
Search for all the images you want to include in your photo collage in the first step. Then choose one of the
templates

and design it as you like. Do you want specific images to be highlighted and displayed larger? Or do you want to arrange the photos by themes, colors, or occasions? Let your imagination run wild! Each image in the photo collage can be
individually edited or adjusted
. TIP: The more images your collage contains, the larger your format should be to ensure everything remains recognizable.

body.headline: Vacation collages: your best travel moments

content.text: Dreamy sunsets, fabulous views, delicious food: You have gathered so many wonderful impressions from your trip that it would be a shame not to put them on paper. Why not create a holiday collage out of them? With carefully selected materials, numerous design templates, and even more customization options, you can immortalize your journey. Start designing now and look forward to the fast delivery of your holiday collage!

body.headline: Vacation collages: Ready for vacation!

content.text: Feel the sand between your toes again as you look at your holiday collage! Think of the colorful sunset and taste the refreshing sundowner at the beach bar. Let all your holiday memories merge into a cohesive picture with your collage, bringing you back to your dream destination at any time. Whether you've reached the highest mountain peak or performed the coolest cannonball splash - every moment is worth having its own place on your collage. Let's get started!
Your collage "Vacation" keeps your memories alive in everyday life.
Wähle das Material und das Format für Deine Collage aus und klicke auf den dazugehörigen Button. So kommst Du in den Collagen-Konfigurator.

Oben links im Konfigurator werden Dir die gewählten Angaben angezeigt. Mit dem kleinen Stift, der sich daneben befindet, kannst Du das Material und das Format noch mal ändern. Das geht ebenso über die Buttons rechts neben der Collage-Vorschau.
Lade jetzt Deine Bilder hoch und wähle das passende Layout
Du kannst das Layout-Raster automatisch mit Deinen Fotos befüllen oder es selbst machen
Erstelle Deine Collage Urlaub nun nach Lust und Laune mit einem schönen Hintergrund, persönlichen Texten und fröhlichen Cliparts
Über die beiden Buttons rechts unten neben der Vorschau kannst Du ganz einfach Bilder und Texte hinzufügen und diese nach Deinem Geschmack gestalten.
Ganz viel Spaß dabei!
Creating your vacation collage

The MYPOSTER Collagen Configurator is like a small, pleasant journey: A beautiful place to stay, explore, discover, and play! Already with just one photo, you can enhance it with a beautiful background, your texts, and countless cliparts on a variety of themes. The more you look around, the more beautiful things you will find. There is a wide range of different layouts available for up to 80 photos.
Now, embark on the configurator discovery journey!

body.headline: You can find the perfect Photo Collage template here.

content.text: No matter the occasion, no matter the taste - we have the perfect design template for your photo collage. You can customize it to your preferences in our configurator, with as many images, backgrounds, text fields, and other details as you like. And of course, you can also have your collage printed: as a poster, canvas, on acrylic glass, and more!

body.subline: Create your perfect collage with our unique designs
body.headline: PHOTO COLLAGE DESIGN WITH OUR TEMPLATES
Photo Collage Templates: We have it all!

content.text: Whether romantic, simple, as a gift, or for a wedding, with our photo collage templates, there is definitely a design for you. Simply browse through our various categories and let yourself be inspired! Once you've found your model, you can customize it in our configurator, add your photos, change or add text, and more. You have all the creative possibilities, and thanks to the intuitive interface, you'll quickly find your way. Alternatively, you can also design without a photo collage template and start with a blank canvas. The result is always the same: a 100% personalized collage exactly to your liking, which you will still enjoy looking at even after years. Choose the right photos and start creating now!
Your collage, your design - thanks to our templates

Our design templates are just the beginning! When you have found your favorite, you can customize it completely in our configurator - on your computer, smartphone, or tablet. You can replace our sample images with your own, add as many images as you like, change the background, adjust the format and material, and more! Try out different ideas before making a decision. Save all your designs with a single click in your customer account so you can compare them later. In the end, you only need to choose the appropriate material, add a frame if desired, and order your collage. We can even print many variants for you express so that your collage will be with you the next day!
Customize your photo collage template in the configurator - make it fit.

When creating your collage, you can let your imagination run wild with us and take your photo collage template to a new level with a variety of embellishments, clip arts, and fonts. Highlight design elements or texts with gold, rose gold, or silver foiling, or experiment with different fonts until you find your favorite. Additionally, you can add image elements and clip arts that fit the theme of your collage. In the configurator, you can choose from thousands of options, easily insert, enlarge, rotate elements with a click, etc. This turns our design template into your own personal collage in no time, tailored to your vision. Start designing now for the best results!
Enhancements, graphical elements, and fonts for your photo collage template.

You can freely choose whether you want to print your collage on a poster, canvas, acrylic glass, gallery bond, and more using your template. Additionally, we can deliver your photo collage directly in a wooden, aluminum, or plastic frame upon request. This way, you can hang it on the wall right after unpacking. While designing, you can easily check the different options in the configurator and compare various models. Select the material that best matches your style and images and click on 'order'. Your collage template will look even better in real life, we promise!
The suitable material for your photo collage template.

body.headline: Photo Collage for Christmas: Perfect for the festive season
The perfect Christmas gift: "Christmas" Photo Collage

content.text: Schon wieder ein Paar Socken? Es ist nicht immer leicht das perfekte Weihnachtsgeschenk zu finden. Doch etwas, was bei allen Familienmitgliedern und Freunden gut ankommt: Fotocollagen zu Weihnachten. Um eine
Weihnachtscollage zu erstellen

Weihnachtskarte
bei. Diese kannst Du einfach bei uns mitbestellen.
Christmas photo collage

MYPOSTER bietet Dir eine große Anzahl an thematisch passenden X-Mas Collagen-Vorlagen. Das bedeutet für Dich, dass Du nur eine Vorlage auswählen musst, die Dir gefällt. Christmas collages

body.headline: Design a Canvas Prints collage easily

content.text: Create a unique image by arranging multiple photos with a self-designed
photo canvas collage
. Upload as many photos as you'd like into your template, add texts, and choose the perfect background color!

Printed on a real canvas, your pictures will shine in true colors. Choose from various sizes, from small to XXL. Your canvas, printed with your photos, will be stretched onto a so-called Perfect Frame frame, so you never have to tighten your canvas collage. These wooden stretcher frames are custom made in our in-house carpentry workshop according to your measurements - optionally in a frame thickness of 2.5 or 3.8 cm.
Give your memories the perfect platform: Have your
collage printed on canvas

body.headline: All information about your Photo Canvas Collage

content.text: MYPOSTER bietet Fotoleinwand Collagen an, die nie nachgespannt werden müssen, nicht einmal bei größeren Formaten. Dies liegt daran, dass in der hauseigenen Schreinerei einzigartige "Perfect Frame" Keilrahmen hergestellt werden, die so robust sind, dass sie sich nicht verziehen. Durch die eigene Herstellung der Leinwand Collagen können sie millimetergenau in jeder Größe angefertigt werden und wahlweise 2,5 cm oder 3,8 cm stark gemacht werden. Im Vergleich zu anderen Herstellern, die nur 1,9 cm verwenden, sind die Leinwand Collagen von MYPOSTER deutlich stabiler.
Canvas Collage: Extra sturdy
Do you want to create a high-quality and personal
canvas with multiple photos

? Our photo canvas collage is the perfect choice for you. Are you unsure about the layout or the correct arrangement of the pictures? It's best to get inspired by our templates and upload your most beautiful motifs to the configurator. Do you have the perfect idea yourself? Then start with our blank design and create in a few steps a
high-quality and appealing photo collage on canvas
from your most beautiful motifs.
Your photo collage canvas: as unique as you

Once you have arranged all the photos to your liking, you can then choose the appropriate size and thickness of your Perfect Frames, on which your photo canvas collage will be stretched. Adding a suitable Shadow Box Frame will further emphasize your motif - try it out in the configurator! You will be surprised by the effect a frame can give to your photo collage canvas.
Create canvas collage - tailored to your measurements
You have the choice to display your personalized
photo
either on a
canvas
or on
metal
. Choose from a variety of different materials and options at MYCANVAS to showcase your favorite moments in the best design on your wall. Have you considered a
photo book
? You can also create one at MYCANVAS. You will undoubtedly find the perfect personalized photo gift for your loved ones.
More than just a canvas collage

body.headline: Design a family collage simply.

content.text: At our place, you will find a wide variety of beautifully designed templates to easily create your family photo collage. Just select your best photos, upload them to our configurator, and customize backgrounds, colors, texts, etc. according to your preferences. This process is completely intuitive with us. When it comes to printing, you have options with us: poster, canvas, acrylic glass, and more, with or without frames. Start creating your family collage now!

body.headline: Family collage from MYPOSTER - individual and chic.

content.text: Before choosing the pictures for your family photo collage, it's best to take a look through our designs. Whether you want to showcase just one or two pictures beautifully or combine multiple motifs, we have the perfect template for you! In our configurator, you can further customize them by changing backgrounds and colors, adjusting and adding text, and integrating more images into the design. Thanks to the intuitive interface, all of this can be done in just a few clicks. If you prefer to start without a template, that's also possible. Simply select a blank collage and customize it according to your preferences. Either way, you'll end up with a 100% personalized family collage that will definitely make a statement on your wall. Upload your photos directly!
Design a family collage from our templates.

If you simply select a pretty design template, insert your images, and click 'order' with us, you can never really go wrong. However, if you want to delve a little deeper, our configurator offers you all the options. For example, you can customize backgrounds, colors, and layout in just a few clicks, make changes or additions to your images, and preview different materials. You can also easily add matching image elements and text elements in various sizes and fonts. Whether you prefer designing on your computer, smartphone, or tablet doesn't matter. You can easily save drafts in your customer account and flexibly continue working on them on all your devices. When you're done, it's best to choose a nice frame. In a few days, you can already hang your family collage on the wall at home!
Customize family collage easily using our configurator.

Our collages not only look great on your own walls, but they also make the perfect gift for family gatherings. Whether it's parents, grandparents, siblings, aunts, or uncles, everyone in the family will be delighted by a well-crafted family photo collage. Whether you simply combine some family pictures, want to gift your wedding photos, or immortalize a shared vacation, you can still think about it. You'll definitely find a suitable design template for your theme among our selection. And if you want to add an extra photo, you can easily do so in the configurator. Another great advantage is that once you've designed it, you can gift your collage to all family members and have all the gifts ready for Christmas, for example. Who in your family would appreciate a family collage the most?
Perfect for gifting - a family collage from us.

Poster, Leinwand, Acrylglas, Gallery Bond oder vielleicht Forex? Wir drucken Deine Collage Familie auf dem Material Deiner Wahl. Und wenn Du willst, kommt Deine Familiencollage direkt im Rahmen bei Dir an.
So kannst Du sie sofort an die Wand hängen, wenn sie da ist. Im Konfigurator kannst Du Dir verschiedene Materialien und Rahmen (auch mit Passepartout) einfach in der Vorschau ansehen.
Suche Dir Deine Lieblingskombination aus und bestelle Deine Collage genau so, wie Du möchtest!

content.text: A love collage from us always evokes strong emotions, whether as a romantic gift or a stylish wall art for your shared space. You can choose from many beautiful design templates for your collage and then customize them with your photos. body.headline: Create your own collage with photos.

content.text: Whether flowery or plain, playful or pure – you will find a wide variety of perfectly designed design templates for your collage love with us, where you are sure to find your favorite. Search for your most beautiful couple photos right away and try out a few variations! And if you prefer to design completely freely without a template, that's also no problem: Simply choose a blank collage and create your layout completely yourself. This can be done super intuitively in our configurator, and colors, texts, image elements, and more can be adjusted in no time. This way, you have all the possibilities to design your collage exactly how you love it, and you will still enjoy looking at it in many years to come! Start now!
Templates for love collages that make hearts beat faster.

In your favorite template, there may not be enough space for all your photos or you may want to add a quote? This can be easily done in our configurator with just a few clicks, as our designs are just the beginning. Everything from layout to backgrounds and texts, fonts, image elements, and materials can be customized to your liking. You have the complete freedom to work on your design on a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Thanks to Cross-Device Upload, for example, your partner can easily add photos to your collage via a link. This gives you the maximum flexibility in designing your photo collage and allows you to unleash your creativity to your heart's content. If desired, you can also get a matching frame made of wood, aluminum, or plastic as an extra bonus. Then you can hang up your love collage directly at home. Go ahead and pick a special place for it now!
Choose a design from Collage Liebe and customize it to your liking.

At least as romantic as a bouquet of flowers and still stylish even after years: a love collage from us is the perfect gift for your sweetheart. Capture shared outings, wonderful moments together, or small moments that bond you - and enjoy them over and over again when you see them on the wall! No matter which photos you choose, you will certainly find a design template with us that your partner will love. You can also customize with a fitting quote or romantic image details! Perhaps you could even make it a tradition, and gift a love collage with the highlights of the past year every anniversary or Valentine's Day. Start right away, choose some beautiful pictures, and create your couple's collage as a romantic gift!
Love photomontage - a gift from the heart.

body.headline: Everything about poster collages

content.text: Our life is full of beautiful moments. Moments that deserve to be captured. A wonderful way to preserve these memories is by printing them as a poster collage. You can order these laminated or non-laminated with us. Additionally, we offer you a great selection of frames and hanging accessories for your collage on poster.
Many photos, one poster

At MYPOSTER, we always go the extra mile. This also applies to the production of our products. When you order a poster collage from us, you can be sure to receive a product of the highest quality standards. We print your photos with an 8-color printing system on high-quality photo paper - with or without lamination. We also offer Hahnemühle artist paper for printing your poster collage. This paper has an elegant, matte surface and is particularly color accurate. After cutting and a final product inspection, we prepare your poster collage for shipping.
Making a collage into a poster

If your poster collage is intended as a gift and you may not have thought about ordering it in time, we have good news for you: Our 24-hour express shipping makes it possible, for an extra charge, for your poster to be with you already on the next working day if you place your order before 11 a.m. However, even in standard shipping, your individual poster collages will be with you at home after about 3 working days.
Express shipping for collage on poster

Once you have chosen your favorites, you can flexibly customize everything in the configurator, from photos to backgrounds, texts, and more! Of course, you can also choose to start with a blank template and create your layout completely from scratch. This way, you will end up with a friends collage that perfectly fits your friendship and will bring you joy for years to come. Start gathering your best photos and create your collage with us in just a few clicks!
Our friends Collage Designs are something you can become friends with.

In our configurator, you can easily create a collage with your friends, whether you're on a computer, smartphone, or tablet. Using Cross-Device-Upload, your friends can simply upload photos to your collage via a link – in the best quality and regardless of the device. Say goodbye to the hassle of USB sticks or external hard drives. In the configurator, you can then customize everything to your liking in your favorite template, add or delete image slots, change colors or layouts, and add clip arts and embellishments. All of this happens super intuitively and with just a few clicks. If you want to try out different variations, you can easily save your designs in your customer account. Once you've chosen a version, you have a variety of materials and frames to choose from. Take a look at a few options and find the collage that best suits you and your friends!
Create a friendship collage together - with Cross-Device-Upload.

The best part about good friendships are the shared experiences. You can transform them into unique gifts with us. Whether it's holiday pictures, party snapshots, a compilation of past years, or a special moment: a collage from us will surely be well-received, for example, as a "Best Friend" collage. We have already prepared a variety of design templates for you, so you can easily find something for any theme. Instead of getting out scissors and construction paper, you can create your collage comfortably from your computer or phone. Another practical aspect: print your collage multiple times with us and give it as a gift to your whole circle of friends, or treat yourself to a copy too!
A great gift idea - photo collage for friends.

Whether it's a simple poster, a stylish canvas, or printed in an exhibition-style as Gallery Bond, you can get your Friends photo collage on the material of your choice from us. We also offer many models in custom sizes, allowing you to adjust the height and width down to the millimeter. If you'd like a frame, you can simply add one - choose from wood, aluminum, or plastic, with various matting options. This way, you can hang up your Friends collage as soon as it arrives. For the best results, compare a few different options in our configurator and design your Friends photo collage on the material that suits you best!
Collage Freundschaft, gedruckt, worauf Du willst.

body.headline: Create a Photo Collage Heart online
Comes from the bottom of my heart: Your heart collage

content.text: The stylized heart has always been the symbol of love. That's exactly why it is used to express affection and should not be missing in declarations of love. Even though today you can quickly convey 'You are dear to me' with a small emoji, it's still worth putting in a little extra effort for the most important people in our lives. A compilation of photos from the relationship, the most beautiful moments in shared life will remind you and your loved one of your love for a long time. Especially when it should be something very special for Valentine's Day or your anniversary, a heart-shaped collage is best suited.
If you want a romantic photo collage for your partner that shouldn't be heart-shaped, we offer many other romantic
Love collage templates
or
Wedding collages
. Surely one of them will make your heart beat faster!
Create photo collage heart online

Gone are the days when you had to struggle with slow photo programs! At MYPOSTER, you can not only choose from a variety of heart collage templates, but our configurator makes the entire design process easier. Let's start at the beginning: Above on this page, you will find our selection of heart templates for your collage. Be inspired by our designs and click on the one you like best. In the next step, you will land in our collage configurator. Here, you can easily add your photos and arrange them in the heart collage. With the Autofill function, you can even do this with just one click! However, what sets a MYPOSTER heart collage apart from all others is that you can personalize every tiny design element in the template. Want a different font? No problem! Change the background? Of course! Incorporate clip arts? Nothing easier than that!
Creating a heart out of photos: Here's how!

Are you satisfied with your heart-shaped photo collage? Next comes the material selection. Choose between poster, canvas, acrylic glass, forex, real glass, with or without frame, and much more! Did you know? MYPOSTER cares about the environment: We print your heart-shaped photo collage on high-quality materials with eco-friendly colors.
Once the heart collage is configured, the final step is to add it to the cart and order it. Tip: With the express shipping option, your heart collage will arrive even faster.
But what if not only the collage is heart-shaped, but the whole picture? That's when our
photos in heart shape
are just right.
A photo heart as a collage
